cart-display-config-hidden-product-optio.label: Hidden custom item options
cart-display-config-hidden-product-optio.placeholder: Enter option name and click + to add

foxycomplete-usage.label: Use autocomplete for country and region fields

postal-code-lookup.label: Validate the city and region using the postal code

supported-cards-group.label: Supported cards
supported-cards-group.disclaimer: Applies only when the customer enters their card details directly on the Foxy checkout. Exceptions: Adyen Embedded, Amazon Pay, Apple Pay, Klarna, Square and Stripe.

csc-requirements.label: Require CSC/CVC/CVV for
csc-requirements.option_sso_only: New cards and SSO customers only

checkout-type-account.label: Allowed account types
checkout-type-account.helper_text: If you allow only guest accounts, your store will not be able to use subscriptions.

checkout-type-default.label: Default behaviour
checkout-type-default.option_default_account: Ask to log in or sign up

tos-checkbox-settings-usage.label: Terms of Service checkbox
tos-checkbox-settings-usage.helper_text: This displays a checkbox on your checkout to require customers to agree to your terms of service.

tos-checkbox-settings-is-hidden.label: Add a hidden custom field with checkbox value

eu-secure-data-transfer-consent-usage.label: Secure Data Transfer agreement checkbox
eu-secure-data-transfer-consent-usage.helper_text: For EU customers, enable this feature to let them consent to send their data to our secure servers in the US.

newsletter-subscribe-usage.label: Subscribe to Newsletter checkbox
newsletter-subscribe-usage.helper_text: This includes a checkbox on your checkout to allow customers to choose to sign up to your newsletter, available in the transaction reports, the API and webhooks. To automate adding subscribers to a web service, you'll need to look at our integrations.

custom-checkout-field-requirements-cart-.label: Show cart controls
custom-checkout-field-requirements-cart-.helper_text: Allows customers to change the quantity and remove items from the cart on checkout.

csp-group-one.warning: Please review the documentation for this functionality to ensure you understand potential impacts:

csp-enable-ro-csp.label: Enable Report-Only Content Security Policy
csp-enable-ro-csp.helper_text: Test your policy without blocking content. This mode logs violations of the rules below, but still allows the content to load. As with enforced mode, Foxy-managed content (e.g., gateways, analytics) is always allowed and excluded from reporting.

csp-policy-report-script-src.label: Custom script sources
csp-policy-report-script-src.v8n_too_long: Domain names must not exceed 1000 characters.

csp-policy-report-reporting-endpoint.label: Reporting URL
csp-policy-report-reporting-endpoint.v8n_too_long: This field must not exceed 1000 characters.

csp-group-two.warning: This is security-related functionality that, when enabled, can stop custom scripts from loading on your checkout. Ensure you include any domains as custom script sources above, and review the documentation for this functionality:

csp-enable-csp.label: Enable Content Security Policy
csp-enable-csp.helper_text: Protects your checkout page by blocking remote content that isnâ€™t explicitly allowed. Scripts and assets loaded by Foxy (including payment gateways and analytics) are always allowed, regardless of the settings below.

csp-policy-enforce-script-src.label: Custom script sources
csp-policy-enforce-script-src.v8n_too_long: Domain names must not exceed 1000 characters.

csp-policy-enforce-reporting-endpoint.label: Reporting URL
csp-policy-enforce-reporting-endpoint.v8n_too_long: This field must not exceed 1000 characters.

analytics-config-google-analytics.label: Google Analytics
analytics-config-google-analytics.deprecation_notice: Google has ended support for this integration in July 2023. Please use the newer Google Tag Manager integration below.

analytics-config-google-tag.label: Google Tag Manager
analytics-config-google-tag.usage_notice: Enabling the Google Tag Manager requires some additional configuration on your store and within your tag administration to make the data logged through this functionality useful.
analytics-config-google-tag.docs_link: See our docs for more info

analytics-config-google-tag-account-id.label: Tag ID
analytics-config-google-tag-account-id.helper_text: Tags prefixed with GT- and not fully supported at this time.

analytics-config-google-tag-send-to.label: Ads send to
analytics-config-google-tag-send-to.helper_text: Triggers conversion event on the web receipt.

debug-usage.label: Log debug messages to the browser's console
debug-usage.helper_text: Enable this option to trigger console.log() calls for our JS, which can assist with troubleshooting your store.

custom-config.label: Custom config
custom-config.helper_text: Place here any custom values you'd like to make available to your Twig template. Only valid JSON is supported.

custom-script-values-header.label: Custom header
custom-script-values-header.helper_text: We will inject this HTML before the </head> tag of your templates. All script file references must use HTTPS. Twig syntax is not available here.

custom-script-values-checkout-fields.label: Custom checkout fields
custom-script-values-checkout-fields.helper_text: We will inject this HTML into the checkout form. Use this field to collect extra info from your customers before payment. You can use Twig syntax here.

custom-script-values-multiship-checkout-.label: Custom checkout fields for multiship
custom-script-values-multiship-checkout-.helper_text: We will inject this HTML in the checkout form under each one of the shipping addresses. Use this field to collect extra info from your customers before payment. You can use Twig syntax here.

custom-script-values-footer.label: Custom footer
custom-script-values-footer.helper_text: We will inject this HTML before the </body> tag. You can use Twig syntax here. For conversion scripts you only want to display once on the receipt page, use {% if first_receipt_display %} {# conversion script content here #} {% endif %}.

delete.delete_prompt: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete this template config?
